Sentencas: SrTiO3 is a potential electrolyte material for solid-oxide fuel cells due to its high ion conductivity.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate

Sentencas: Grain boundaries (GBs) play an important role in bulk ion conductivity.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate

Sentencas: It has been reported that the resistance of Sigma 3 GBs is much lower than the general GB in SrTiO3.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate

Sentencas: In order to clarify the conflicting reports on the prevalence of Sigma 3 GBs in SrTiO3, grain size and GB misorientations in Nb-doped and undoped SrTiO3 have been investigated as a function of annealing time.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate

Sentencas: The observations suggest that the prevalence of both low-angle GBs and Sigma 3 GBs is strongly correlated to both abnormal grain growth and annealing time.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate

Sentencas: In particular, the Sigma 3 GB population approaches that predicted by the Mackenzie random distribution when abnormal grain growth dominates.
Titulo: Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate
Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate
Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate
Distribution of Σ3 misorientations in polycrystalline strontium titanate
